Module 3

Curtain Systems

In this module, you will explore techniques for working with curtain walls and the elements that define a complete curtain systemâ€”panels, grids, and mullions.

You will be able to:

  • Specify the layout and spacing of the curtain wall elements for new curtain wall systems and how to modify existing ones.

  • Explore the design options available for customizing grid patterns, panel materials, and panel types.

Exercise 2 Adjusting Grid Lines
